column4:
hey mates, after upgrading to jaunty, my java is broken. I cant run any java applet or start a .jar file.. in Browser(firefox) a white box is shown, where the applet should load and in the shell, I get this error when trying to run a .jar file: 
 Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (11.3-b02 mixed mode linux-amd64) 
 # Problematic frame: 
 # C  [libc.so.6+0x3158f]  catgets+0x1f
any ideas? I already tried to reinstall sun-java6-* stuff
